segment.source: Select Package Accelerator Page
segment.target: Select Package Accelerator Page

segment.source: Select Package Accelerator Page
segment.target: Select Package Accelerator Page

segment.source: Select Package Accelerator Page
segment.target: Select Package Accelerator Page

segment.source: Use the Select Package Accelerator page to select the Package Accelerator that will be used to create the new virtual application package.
segment.target: Use the Select Package Accelerator page to select the Package Accelerator that will be used to create the new virtual application package.

segment.source: You must copy the Package Accelerator to a folder on the computer running the App-V Sequencer.
segment.target: You must copy the Package Accelerator to a folder on the computer running the App-V Sequencer.

segment.source: For more information, see About App-V Package Accelerators (App-V 4.6 SP1).
segment.target: For more information, see About App-V Package Accelerators (App-V 4.6 SP1).

segment.source: Only run Package Accelerators from publishers that you trust.
segment.target: Only run Package Accelerators from publishers that you trust.

segment.source: Package Accelerators usually include a digital signature.
segment.target: Package Accelerators usually include a digital signature.

segment.source: A digital signature is an electronic security mark that can help indicate the publisher of the software, and whether the package has been tampered with after the transform was originally signed.
segment.target: A digital signature is an electronic security mark that can help indicate the publisher of the software, and whether the package has been tampered with after the transform was originally signed.

segment.source: If you use a transform that has been digitally signed by a publisher and the publisher has verified its identity with a certification authority, you can be more confident that the transform comes from that specific publisher and has not been altered.
segment.target: If you use a transform that has been digitally signed by a publisher and the publisher has verified its identity with a certification authority, you can be more confident that the transform comes from that specific publisher and has not been altered.

segment.source: The App-V Sequencer notifies you if any of the following conditions are true:
segment.target: The App-V Sequencer notifies you if any of the following conditions are true:

segment.source: The selected transform has not been digitally signed.
segment.target: The selected transform has not been digitally signed.

segment.source: The selected transform is signed by a publisher that has not verified its identity with a certification authority.
segment.target: The selected transform is signed by a publisher that has not verified its identity with a certification authority.

segment.source: The selected transform has been altered after it was digitally signed and released.
segment.target: The selected transform has been altered after it was digitally signed and released.

segment.source: If any of these messages are displayed when using a Package Accelerators, visit the Package Accelerators publisher’s website to get a digitally signed version of the transform.
segment.target: If any of these messages are displayed when using a Package Accelerators, visit the Package Accelerators publisher’s website to get a digitally signed version of the transform.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Browse
segment.target: Browse

segment.source: Click Browse to specify the Package Accelerator that you will use to create the virtual application package.
segment.target: Click Browse to specify the Package Accelerator that you will use to create the virtual application package.

segment.source: Save the Package Accelerator you specified locally on the computer that is running the Sequencer.
segment.target: Save the Package Accelerator you specified locally on the computer that is running the Sequencer.

segment.target: Related topics
